A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: We loved it!!! It could have had fewer porgs and cute animals\, that is true; but the film has not only beautiful visuals\, but also a great heart. It does not feel like a repetition\, remake or copy\, although it pays hommage to the original films in many ways. I loved Leia and her (finally!!) extended role in it\, and Luke was just simply wonderful as an old grumpy hermit. I personally absolutely enjoyed the Rey and Kylo storyline and cannot wait to see more of the new unstable Supreme Leader. My new favourite Star Wars film!!
